title: Fetish Girl
description: Ursula is a twenty-seven year old woman with a penchant for black latex. When she meets a swimmer who shares her fetish, she is then introduced to his gay lover. Together they engage in mastery and submission, satisfying each other with delicious pleasures of the flesh.Sylvia Bayer was one of the pen names of John Glassco. Fetish Girl has also been published under Glassco's pen name Miles Underwood.
author: John Glassco
